price: (74) But indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter are deviating from the path.
arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ عَنِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ لَنَٰكِبُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-inna alladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati ʿani al-ṣirāṭi lanākibūna
